mapper.insert: insert into coupon(NUM, NAME, RATE_DISCOUNT, CONTENT, COUPON_IMAGE, CODE, ISSUE_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE, USER_NUM) values(coupon_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{rate_discount}, #{content}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{code}, #{issue_date}, #{expiry_date}, #{user_num})
mapper.select: select num, name, rate_discount, content, coupon_image AS saveFilename, TO_CHAR(issue_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS issue_date, TO_CHAR(expiry_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS expiry_date, nickname from coupon c join member_info m on c.user_num=m.user_num order by num asc OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

select num, name, rate_discount, content, code, coupon_image AS saveFilename, TO_CHAR(issue_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS issue_date, TO_CHAR(expiry_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS expiry_date, nickname from coupon c join member_info m on c.user_num=m.user_num where c.num=#{num}

select m.num, nickname, use_state, TO_CHAR(m.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date from member_coupon m join member_info m2 on m.user_num=m2.user_num order by num asc OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
